title: Laguna de Nuxco
description: A beautiful coastal lagoon surrounded by mangroves and rich biodiversity. Ideal for birdwatching, boat rides, and enjoying the tranquility of Tecpanâ€™s natural environment.

title: Piedra Tlacoyunque
description: A massive rock formation on the Tecpan coast, home to sea birds and turtles. Its impressive scenery makes it a favorite spot for nature lovers and photographers.

title: Playa de Cayaquitos
description: A quiet and picturesque beach with soft sand and gentle waves, perfect for relaxing, swimming, and experiencing the calm lifestyle of the Costa Grande.
